alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Poweshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 19 at 11:30PM CDT until April 20 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Poweshiek County in central Iowa... Southeastern Jasper County in central Iowa... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Reasnor, or 6 miles south of Newton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Sully and Kellogg around 1140 PM CDT. Lynnville and Oakland Acres around 1145 PM CDT. Grinnell, Searsboro and Grinnell Regional Airport around 1150 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 159 and 184. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
